entries.value:
"Main Context Document (MCD): 925 Silver LLC E-commerce MVP (Shadcn/UI & Detailed Frontend)

1. Overview & Goals

Objective: To launch a modern, public-facing e-commerce website for 925 Silver LLC that allows customers to browse and purchase products online, supported by a foundational backend for managing online orders, customers, and inventory.

Scope (Phase 1 - MVP):
- Public E-commerce Storefront: A clean, visually appealing, and mobile-responsive website built with Vite, Vue.js, and shadcn/ui.
- Product Catalog & Detail Pages: Users can browse products by category and view detailed information and images for each item.
- Core Inventory Management (Admin): A secure backend interface for the owner to add, edit, and remove products, and manage stock levels for items sold online.
- User Accounts & Secure Checkout: Customers can create accounts, manage their profiles, and complete purchases securely.
- Order Management System (Admin): An admin panel for the owner to view and manage incoming online orders.

Scope (Future Phases / Out-of-Scope for MVP):
- Advanced CRM features (birthday reminders, loyalty program).
- Full supplier and procurement management.
- In-store POS functionality.
- Tracking for consignments, repairs, and custom orders.
- Advanced analytics and reporting dashboard.
- Integration with external payment gateways beyond basic checkout.

Success Criteria:
- The public website is live and accessible on a custom domain via Vercel.
- A potential customer can successfully browse products, add an item to their cart, and complete a secure checkout.
- When an online sale is completed, the inventory quantity for that item is automatically decremented in the Supabase database.
- The business owner can log into a secure admin panel to add a new product to the website, including its name, description, price, and images.
- The owner receives a notification and can view the details of a new online order."
entries.description: Raw MCD document content - Part 1: Overview & Goals
